reviewText: I bought these for my granddaughter who is 3!! She is very entertained and is in love with Scooby and Shaggy!! I like that you get 2 great films for the price of one!
I was very happy with this as it is a difficult movie to come across in stores. It was a nice bonus to have an additional movie included and the price was quite reasonable.
Who can pass up Scooby Doo?  Have been a fan for years and enjoy watching Scooby Doo with our grandchildren!
These two and the Witches Ghost are my fav Scooby Doo movies! They came in great cond, sealed and all i would deff recommend it!

These DVDs are amazing. They are in perfect quality when you receive them and, their sound is very clear, and the movie never pauses when you don't want it too. The image is amazing very clear as well. Amazing DVDs!
The kids really like the Alien Invaders and Zombie Island.  Both are a lttle scarier than the usual Scooby-Doo videos, but they were riveted to the action and suspense.

I originally bought these for my 3-yr old nephew but he's not quite ready for the Zombie Island movie, but found the Aliens to be funny. The cartoons were both okay, but not as good as the original cartoon series. I personally liked the Zombie movie better than the Aliens.
I'd prefer to have the movie each on their own disc but its whatever! This is an awesome product!
Movies work perfectly. They are two of my favorite Scooby Doo movies. Definitely worth the buy.
I am a huge fan of Scooby doo and two movies at a reasonable price is just amazing zombie island is my favorite movie of all time. alien invaders is a okay movie but it cannot beat zombie island

My son is really into Scooby-Doo right now, so when I saw this double pack it was a must buy! At such a good price you get 2 different movies that won't disappoint! I was also excited to be able to get this Scooby-Doo, the Scooby I grew up watching! Perfect for your mystery loving kiddos!
I only received one of the movies in this package, at first I thought both movies were in 1 disc but only one was on it.
love it!
Great movies, good price!
I just love the  Scooby-Doo  movies!!! I also love the price,too!!!

Ohhh how I love Scooby Doo and his adventures. They're a steal at this price and well worth the watch!

I love this product. I have tried Raid . Hotshot and Ortho and none of them did the job. The product does what it says no mess no smell I love it. I love the results will recommend it to all my friends.
great collection of scooby movies for the price. zombie island is my all time favorite scooby movie. the alien invasion is a great movie as well. great collection of movies that kids will love

I got this for my husband who loved the zombie island movie growing up.  We watched it again as adults and it did not disappoint.  Zombie island is fun and has a lot of cultural references to New Orleans.  The alien invasion movie was also quite entertaining.  You really can't beat the price for a double feature.
Very enjoyable. Never to old for Scooby-Doo!

I wasn't sure how to feel about this when I ordered it but I thought it was a good deal so I got it.  I was confused until I squinted looking at the DVD that came in the case- it's only one disk- and realized that I had to flip the disk depending on the movie I'd want to watch at the time.  I think it's a good purchase if you love the show and are on a budget, but I wish it was easier to realize without looking at the DVD itself to see which movie you'd be watching.
Perfect gift for teenager.

These are two great Scooby-Doo movies. I truly enjoy both of these movies. Both have excellent storylines and show great aspects of the Mystery Incorporated Gang.

I have only one complaint and this is just personal preference the product is a double sided DVD. It isn't major enough to affect the enjoyment of this product however.

My six year old daughter just loves Scooby-Doo. These movies were perfect for her. She was very excited to receive them. Met all of her expectations.
These were both my fav. Scooby Doo movies growing up, I think they work perfectly together, both real mysteries and monsters.

My kids love zombie island.  They are 2 and 4.  It's a little scary but they still like it.  The Alien invasion story is good but maybe not quit as good as zombie island.  My son seems to prefer it because he likes aliens.  Just to note, the DVD is two sided.  A scooby doo movie on each side.  That threw me off at first.  Good value.

I ordered this as a gift for a three year old who loves Scooby Doo.  I ordered it new but when it came it was obviously used.  The cover was torn the case was dented and had a hole in it.  To make matters worse they shrink wrapped it and sent it out as new.  I can't return it because I can't print the return label and even if I could I would have to buy an envelope and actually pay for their mistake.  I can't find a phone number for customer service.  All in all I could have bought this in a store or another online retailer with less hassle.  As it is I am stuck with a DVD I can't give out as a gift and don't want to keep.  I give to charity not to amazon.
My little boy loved it warned five times in three days. glad I bought it so we can keep on enjoying it.

I ordered this as a gift for a three year old who loves Scooby Doo.  I ordered it new but when it came it was obviously used.  The cover was torn the case was dented and had a hole in it.  To make matters worse they shrink wrapped it and sent it out as new.  I can't return it because I can't print the return label and even if I could I would have to buy an envelope and actually pay for their mistake.  I can't find a phone number for customer service.  All in all I could have bought this in a store or another online retailer with less hassle.  As it is I am stuck with a DVD I can't give out as a gift and don't want to keep.  I give to charity not to amazon.

Videos are perfect

Great pairing. I just wanted the Alien Invaders but this two for special was too inviting to pass up. The disk worked well. It comes with one disk that play double sided; one movie on each side.

Alien Invaders is quite possible my favorite Scooby tale. The story is fun. I also dig the side love interest story with Shagster. The song during the dating montage is an excellent catchy tune.

I don't want to give away too much to the ones who have not seen this beauty, but I leave you with this bit of trivia: Mark Hamill (Luke Skywalker) does the voice of Steve. How fun is that?
Two great movies on a double sided DVD.
